Package helpers

Class UploadHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • helpers.UploadHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Helper, java.lang.Runnable, ITimeoutEventHandler
    public class UploadHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Helper, java.lang.Runnable, ITimeoutEventHandler
    UploadHelper to upload a file.
    Author:
    huub.lievestro
